title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: Access GPU computing nodes from community members all around the worldhttps://clore.ai/what can be rentedAny reasonably modern computer/server with NVIDIA GPUfeesWe currently charge 2.5% fee from orders placed on spot market and 10% from on demand orders + very low order creation fee (lower than $0.01)This is a new service. I haven't tested it yet.They rent Nvidia graphics cards for rendering and other tasks.
